title: Persona 4 the Animation: The Factor of Hope
alternative_title: ペルソナ4 the Animation -the Factor of Hope-
description: The film not only recaped the entire 25-episode television anime series with new cuts, but also the unaired "True End Episode" that was included in the 10th Blu-ray Disc/DVD volume.
